Gay Marriage Activists: Minn. Vote Offers Opportunity : NPR
 
 So the hope is that this would be the first ballot amendment vote gay priders would win. Incidentally, since one of their main talking points is to argue the supposed injustice of 'putting their rights to a vote' when these things come up, it will be fascinating to see if they still reject the vote in the event they WIN it. emoticon_xangel
 Bet ya 10 to 1 they'll suddenly and hypocritically drop that argument, for the most part.
 
 Personally, I would vote against the amendment. But it's the gall of special interest groups to dictate to the people that they should or shouldn't exercise democracy that ticks me off.
